title: Naver Cloud privacy policy update
body:
Service: Naver Cloud
Change: Retention extended to 5 years.
Third-party sharing: Cloud vendors
Revoke path: Settings > Privacy > Withdraw consent
Data items: Name, Email, Payment info

title: ModuPay marketing consent
body:
Service: ModuPay
Purpose: Marketing updates
Data items: Email, Phone
Retention: Until consent withdrawal
Revoke path: Email request

title: Healthflow terms update
body:
Service: Healthflow
Change: Added health data processing purpose
Retention: Delete on service termination
Third-party sharing: None
Revoke path: Support inquiry

title: SmartClass consent form
body:
Service: SmartClass
Purpose: Online classes
Data items: Name, Email, Learning records
Retention: 3 years
Third-party sharing: Analytics partner
Revoke path: Web form
